dcterms:description: HateXplain is a benchmark hate speech dataset which consists of 20K posts from Twitter and Gab. The dataset has fine-grained annotations for religion, race, and gender. It combines annotations for offensive and hate speech into one class of toxic text.
dcterms:title: HateXplain
